global.title: Proguard - Modern Coating & Insulation Solutions
global.description: A complete range of waterproofing, thermal, acoustic insulation, and protective industrial coatings.

hero.title: Innovation, Durability, and Performance in Coatings
hero.subtitle: We build a more secure and sustainable future for your construction and industrial projects with specialized solutions.

ultraguard.title: UltraGuard
ultraguard.desc: Advanced waterproofing coating based on modified resins for a seamless, flexible layer.

bioguard.title: BloGuard
bioguard.desc: New generation of crystalline waterproofing material that creates a permanent, internal seal in concrete.

smartguard.title: SmartGuard
smartguard.desc: A two-component waterproofing system based on acrylic resin and cementitious powder, resistant to water pressure.

fastguard.title: FastGuard
fastguard.desc: A rapid-setting cementitious mortar to instantly stop water flow and fix sudden leaks.

richguard.title: RichGuard
richguard.desc: Water-based waterproofing coating with a special acrylic formulation and high elasticity to bridge cracks.

nanoguard.title: NanoGuard
nanoguard.desc: A modern, transparent coating based on nanotechnology, creating a superhydrophobic surface for complete protection.
